name: retrap
description: Open-Source intelligence OSINT tracking and analysis tool. Inspired by Trape.

scripts.postinstall: (cd frontend/guest/ && npm i .) && (cd frontend/host/ && npm i .)
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json '{src,bin}/**/*.ts' && (cd frontend/guest/ && npm run lint) && (cd frontend/host/ && npm run lint)
scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && tsc && (cd frontend/guest/ && npm run build) && (cd frontend/host/ && npm run build && cp -rf build/* ../../build/frontend/)
scripts.pkg: pkg package.json --out-path dist/ # Make sure to run `nvm use` first

author: Mohamed Feddad
